Plot: The movie shows the origin of the Powerpuff Girls before the cartoon series. It explains why they were born and why they dedicated their lives to fighting crime and the forces of evil.
Title: The Powerpuff Girls Movie
Writer: Charlie Bean, Lauren Faust, Craig McCracken, Paul Rudish, Don Shank, Charlie Bean (story), Craig McCracken (story), Amy Keating Rogers (story), Paul Rudish (story), Don Shank (story), Lauren Faust (story), Craig McCracken (creator)
Actors: Cathy Cavadini, Tara Strong, Elizabeth Daily, Roger Jackson
tomatoConsensus: It plays like an extended episode, but The Powerpuff Girls Movie is still lots of fun.
